channel.title: httpd on lvbibir's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in httpd on lvbibir's Blog

item.title: httpd源码构建rpm
item.description: 系统版本：isoft-serveros-v4.2（centos7） 源码下载链接： https://dlcdn.apache.org//apr/apr-1.7.0.tar.bz2 https://dlcdn.apache.org//apr/apr-util-1.6.1.tar.bz2 https://dlcdn.apache.org//httpd/httpd-2.4.52.tar.bz2 安装依赖 yum install -y wget gcc rpm-build yum install -y autoconf zlib-devel libselinux-devel libuuid-devel apr-devel apr-util-devel pcre-devel openldap-devel lua-devel libxml2-devel openssl-devel yum install -y
